dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4382434O] Re: Stolen Content
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Sunday, June 03, 2007 3:32 AM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4382434O] Re: Stolen Content ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Re: Stolen Content Added by system at Sunday, Jun 3 2007 08:30 am X-MailFrom: ryanarrowsmith@gmail.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Sun Jun 3 08:30:15 2007 Received: (qmail 9781 invoked by alias); 3 Jun 2007 13:30:15 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 9777 invoked from network); 3 Jun 2007 13:30:15 -0000 Received: from spooling.theplanet.com (69.56.141.4) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; Sun, 03 Jun 2007 08:29:32 -0500 Received: by wa-out-1112.google.com with SMTP id n4so1678597wag for ; Sun, 03 Jun 2007 06:29:29 -0700 (PDT) DKIM-Signature: a=rsa-sha1; c=relaxed/relaxed; d=gmail.com; s=beta; h=domainkey-signature:received:received:message-id:date:from:to:subject: in-reply-to:mime-version:content-type:references; b=TsK0xX8BXOLrCSW/+BCsCx0s2bk7zwEyrU5qeXbJEKSOEXIWBeWeJ3T99cTncG9feuIKO3 pUDc985gz5hn2efkhirSnJ//PPdd0jmol2kCimjIXxlA/DkUxTLjPwq7hAA1RrrS6f59jk1S pWA1jIORSMPVGcws5tpesZ4xc6fk0= DomainKey-Signature: a=rsa-sha1; c=nofws; d=gmail.com; s=beta; h=received:message-id:date:from:to:subject:in-reply-to:mime-version:cont ent-type:references; b=dhcpJMOszEqbyM5ao8G8fKbYyGCA2GZO1q0Ip1tJoe239raOJ3++ayQYUBiGEWCQpsKBzx l7nZ/owGbjLbLpqSda/iXDudtdnHYAOK5T8XaMEsZJPlD7ChBFoUkMJMBfJ8UmG0nvpjL+Df iUwKenfIEkQYkNE3cGNL4QAOmXPwY= Received: by 10.114.126.1 with SMTP id y1mr3847159wac.1180877369603; Sun, 03 Jun 2007 06:29:29 -0700 (PDT) Received: by 10.141.201.9 with HTTP; Sun, 3 Jun 2007 06:29:29 -0700 (PDT) Message-ID: <738195bf0706030629i465e42ecxcbb103eb05667c13@mail.gmail.com> Date: Sun, 3 Jun 2007 08:29:29 -0500 From: "Ryan Arrowsmith" To: abuse@theplanet.com, legal@theplanet.com, serversales@theplanet.com, enterprisesales@theplanet.com, support@theplanet.com Subject: Re: Stolen Content In-Reply-To: <738195bf0705291104p491a1924v9ab5100ca295d9e8@mail.gmail.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_Part_2411_6480744.1180877369596" References: <738195bf0705291104p491a1924v9ab5100ca295d9e8@mail.gmail.com> Received-SPF: pass (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: domain of gmail.com designates 209.85.146.181 as permitted sender) client-ip=209.85.146.181; envelope-from=ryanarrowsmith@gmail.com; helo=wa-out-1112.google.com; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 03 Jun 2007 13:29:46.0400 (UTC) FILETIME=[40A40A00:01C7A5E3] (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) This is the second time I am requesting that you remove my stolen content from this website. Please remove it immediately. On 5/29/07, Ryan Arrowsmith wrote: > > The website videoto.net is reprinting an article of mine without > permission, and don't have information listed on contacting them. I'd like > the content removed immediately. Please respond asap. Thanks. > > My article: > http://ryanarrowsmith.com/2007/04/18/an-open-letter-to-hollywood/ > Their post: http://videoto.net/id/2180/ > > Ryan Arrowsmith > http://ryanarrowsmith.com > MIME element (text/html) This is the second time I am requesting that you remove my stolen content from this website.  Please remove it immediately.

On 5/29/07, Ryan Arrowsmith <ryanarrowsmith@gmail.com> wrote:
The website videoto.net is reprinting an article of mine without permission, and don't have information listed on contacting them.  I'd like the content removed immediately.  Please respond asap.  Thanks.

My article: http://ryanarrowsmith.com/2007/04 /18/an-open-letter-to-hollywood/
Their post: http://videoto.net/id/2180/

Ryan Arrowsmith
http://ryanarrowsmith.com

MIME element (text/plain)
